description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Narrative of the Peninsular Campaign, 1807-1814. ... Abridged from "The History of the War in the Peninsula" by ... Sir W. F. P. Napier ... By W. T. Dobson, etc" Author: Napier, William Francis Patrick - Sir Contributor: DOBSON, William T. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9078.ff.3." Page: 5 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1889 Publisher: Bickers & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002604418 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
